title: Not Interested in Apple or Amazon: I/O Fund's Kindig
text: Lead Tech Analyst at I/O Fund Beth Kindig says she isn't interested in Apple or Amazon as an AI investor. She explains where she does see potential and why she believes stocks like Arm and Meta are overvalued on “Bloomberg Tech.

title: AAPL INVESTOR ALERT: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman LLC Announces that Apple Inc. Investors with Substantial Losses Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit
text: NEW YORK, July 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Attorney Advertising -- Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman, LLC, a nationally recognized law firm, notifies investors that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Apple Inc. (“Apple” or “the Company”) (NASDAQ: AAPL) and certain of its officers.

title: Wall Street analyst expects Apple to hike the price of some new iPhone models by $50
text: Jefferies analysts predicted a $50 price increase for the iPhone 17 Pro models. The price hike would aim to offset tariff costs, likely affecting Pro and Pro Max models.

title: Apple is in need of a win as it reports earnings this week
text: Apple's fiscal Q3 earnings call is set for Thursday amid tariff and AI challenges. iPhone demand in the US fell in June following tariff-related sales in April and May, analysts said.

title: Six Years Late, Apple's Foldable iPhone Could Still Flip Everything
text: Apple Inc AAPL may be fashionably late, but it's arriving with style — and a plan to bend the market to its will.

title: Investors Grow Impatient With Apple's AI Efforts
text: Wall Street is reportedly growing impatient with the pace of Apple's artificial intelligence efforts. Apple has not been transparent about its strategy, while its competitors have announced plans for new AI-centered data centers and devices, CNBC reported Wednesday (July 30).

title: Apple's stock is in a slump. Can anything from earnings help change the mood?
text: Whether Apple can say enough on AI or tariffs to settle some burning issues remains an open question heading into Thursday's earnings report.

title: How much time does Apple have to figure out its AI strategy?
text: As major tech players double down on artificial intelligence investments, Apple's relative silence in the space is raising concerns among analysts and investors.

title: AAPL INVESTORS: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) Investors may have been Affected by Fraud – Contact BFA Law by August 19 about Potentially Recovering Losses
text: NEW YORK, July 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Leading securities law firm Bleichmar Fonti & Auld LLP announces that a lawsuit has been filed against Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) and certain of the Company's senior executives for potential violations of the federal securities laws. If you invested in Apple, you are encouraged to obtain additional information by visiting: https://www.bfalaw.com/cases-investigations/apple-inc-class-action-lawsuit.

title: Apple is facing pressure from Wall Street to figure out its AI strategy
text: Apple analysts are starting to wonder how much time the company has to find an AI strategy before consumers rethink their iPhone purchases. OpenAI's May acquisition of Jony Ive's startup IO for $6.5 billion put added pressure on Apple.

title: Apple Manufacturing Academy opens in Detroit amid Trump pressure on US production
text: Apple is trying to bring machine learning to Motor City. The smartphone giant opened its Apple Manufacturing Academy in Detroit on Tuesday to offer free workshops on artificial intelligence and advanced manufacturing to small and medium-sized businesses.

title: Dividend Growth Stocks Are the New Tech Stocks — Here's Why
text: For young, growth-focused investors, perhaps dividend growth stocks are a better pick-up at current levels, especially as the red-hot AI stocks consider their next moves going into the turbulent month of September.

title: Apple earnings under pressure from tariffs, slow AI roll-out
text: Long seen as the safest Big Tech bet, Apple is heading into Thursday's earnings with its business facing pressure from U.S. tariffs, tough competition in China and a high-stakes artificial intelligence race it has been late to enter.
